channel.title: Help with 508 server please!
channel.description:
When ever i try to run any type of client it does this..
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: client
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:200)
at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Met hod) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java: 188) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:306) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.ja va:276) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:251) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(ClassLoader.ja va:319) Press any key to continue . . .
It does that with any client i use, and the client has the cache...
This is what happens when i try to run my server...
It takes like 5 minutes and then says
Press any key to continue...
That was my jdk1.0.6_7 Variable..
So when i changed it to jdk1.0.6_6 it did this..
The system cannot find the path specified. The system cannot find the path specified. The system cannot find the path specified. The system cannot find the path specified. The system cannot find the path specified. The system cannot find the path specified. The system cannot find the path specified. The system cannot find the path specified. The system cannot find the path specified. The system cannot find the path specified. The system cannot find the path specified. Press Enter Now Press any key to continue . . .
Can Somebody help me, is there a special variable that i can use, or tell me your variable that makes the 508 client work, do i need to download anything, can you tell me what to put in the server run.bat if i need to edit it same with the client run.bat,can someone tell me how to fix it, JUST PLEASE ANYBODY!! I'VE LOOKED AT SEVERAL TUTS AND IT DOESN'T HELP MY PROBLEM! thanks

item.title: Help with 508 server please!
item.dc:creator: @r34p4g3pk r34p4g3pk
item.description:
@r34p4g3pk wrote:

When ever i try to run any type of client it does this…

Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: client

Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client
at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:200)

    at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Met

hod)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:
188)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:306)
at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.ja
va:276)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:251)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(ClassLoader.ja
va:319)
Press any key to continue . . .

It does that with any client i use, and the client has the cache…

This is what happens when i try to run my server…

It takes like 5 minutes and then says

Press any key to continue…

That was my jdk1.0.6_7 Variable…

So when i changed it to jdk1.0.6_6 it did this…

Press any key to continue . . .

Can Somebody help me, is there a special variable that i can use, or tell me your variable that makes the 508 client work, do i need to download anything, can you tell me what to put in the server run.bat if i need to edit it same with the client run.bat,can someone tell me how to fix it, JUST PLEASE ANYBODY!! I’VE LOOKED AT SEVERAL TUTS AND IT DOESN’T HELP MY PROBLEM! thanks
